Name: The Arcslinger
About the game: When the world is in danger, the people turn to a hero. Entrusted with the mythical gun Angelheart, you must take down the villainous Gold Smoke and his dastardly gang. Do you have what it takes to become The Arcslinger? - An original story and universe - Optimized for Oculus and Vive featuring support for two motion controlled guns - Discover dozens of Arcs and sling them to unleash incredible powers - 15 levels of first-person shooter VR fun - Become a master gunslinger as you fight your way to saving the world - Featuring the voice talents of Nolan North, Jessica DiCicco, Roger Craig Smith, and Jason Spisak
